text: Love is merely the name for the desire and pursuit of the whole.
author: Aristophanes

text: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.
author: Henry Ford

text: Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The hard path is often the right one. The river teaches more than the shore.
author: Maxime Lagace

text: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
author: Vince Lombardi
